import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; const FormContainer = props => { let setInput = props.setInput let getInput = props.getInput const onChange = (event) => { setInput({...getInput, [event.currentTarget.id]: event.currentTarget.value}) console.log(event.currentTarget.id + ": " + event.currentTarget.value) } return(

Please Enter a time and a Timezone!









); } export default FormContainer
